text: i had no choice. last night, she said, why don't we go out for brunch tomorrow and then maybe the arboretum. and i said, well, no, i promised the guys i was going to play a video game with them all weekend. and she said, that sounds like fun, can i come, too? and then i didn't answer for a second, and then she said, well, do you not want me to come? and then i bought her a new laptop and the game, and she's parking the car right now.
